channel.title: Half Life 2 standalone mod restores cut content
channel.description: The Dark Interval mod for Half Life 2 aims to restore various original locations, characters and plot points that didn’t make it to the retail version. [url='https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=https://www.dsogaming.com/news/standalone-mod-half-life-2-restores-content-cut/']https://www.dsogaming.com/news/standalone-mod-half-life-2-restores-content-cut/[/url] Thanks [url='https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=https://bluesnews.com']bluesnews.com[/url] https[url='https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=https://www.bluesnews.com/s/184859/evening-patches']://www.bluesnews.com/s/184859/evening-patches[/url]

item.title: Half Life 2 standalone mod restores cut content
item.dc:creator: ESToomere
item.description:
k3nny1550:

…playing decently…

Could do with a lot more playtesting before release.

item.title: Half Life 2 standalone mod restores cut content
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
I did give Dark Interval a look a while ago. Pretty awesome visual reference for HL2 beta things as well as playing decently on the levels with gameplay. It really needs voice acting and choreography, though.

Read full topic
